meanings.definition: The quality or state of being obvious.
meanings.sent1: The obviousnesses of the situation made it easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the concept with such obviousnesses that everyone grasped it quickly.
meanings.sent3: The obviousnesses of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had an obviousnesses that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The obviousnesses of the safety instructions were crucial during the emergency drill.

meanings.definition: The fact or condition of being readily perceived or understood.
meanings.sent1: The obviousnesses of the answer surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: His explanation lacked the obviousnesses needed for the students to follow.
meanings.sent3: The obviousnesses of the magic trick left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The obviousnesses of her emotions were like an open book to him.
meanings.sent5: The obviousnesses of the solution became clear after a moment of thought.
